courses.title: React Native Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of React Native, including components, state management, and navigation.React Native is an open-source UI software framework developed by Meta Platforms. It is used to develop applications for Android, Android TV, iOS, macOS, tvOS, Web, Windows and UWP by enabling developers to use the React framework along with native platform capabilities. Wikipedia

courses.title: Advanced React Native
courses.description: Dive deeper into React Native with advanced topics like performance optimization, native modules, and testing.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript, including ES6 features, asynchronous programming, and functional programming.

courses.title: Mobile UI/UX Design
courses.description: Learn the principles of mobile UI/UX design, including user research, wireframing, and prototyping.

courses.title: State Management in RN
courses.description: Explore state management solutions in React Native, including Context API, Redux, and MobX.

courses.title: Kubernetes Basic
courses.description: Kubernetes (often shortened to K8s) is an open-source container orchestration system that automates the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. It's a platform for managing workloads like microservices and other containerized applications at scale.
